structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Executive Office For Administration And Finance

law.catch_line: Reports On Estimates By State Departments, Officers, Etc., To Budget Director
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] On the request of either branch of the general court or of the ways and means committee of either branch, or of the governor, or of the council, or of the finance committee, the commissioner shall make a report of such of the estimates of departments, officers and commissions made to the budget director under sections three and four of chapter twenty-nine as may be required, and it may make recommendations relative thereto. Chapter 7: Reports on estimates by state departments, officers, etc., to budget director [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 165, Sec. 49 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] On the request of either branch of the general court or of the ways and means committee of either branch, or of the governor, the secretary shall make a report of such of the estimates of departments, officers and commissions made to the budget director under sections three and four of chapter twenty-nine as may be required, and it may make recommendations relative thereto.
